  • 18650 Battery
  • View page source

18650 BatteryÂ¶

  • VCC: Battery positive terminal, here there are two sets of VCC and GND is to increase the current and reduce the resistance.

  • Middle: To balance the voltage between the two cells and thus protect the battery.

  • GND: Negative battery terminal.

This is a custom battery pack made by SunFounder consisting of two 18650 batteries with a capacity of 2200mAh. The connector is XH2.54-4P, which can be charged directly after being inserted into the Zeus Car shield.

Pins Out

Features

  • Battery charge: 5V/2A

  • Battery output: 5V/5A

  • Battery capacity: 3.7V 2000mAh x 2

  • Battery life: 90min

  • Battery charge time: 130min

  • Connector: PH2.0, 5P
